com.dotmarketing.util

Class ThreadUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.util.ThreadUtils

  • public final class ThreadUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    The ThreadUtilities class provides a collection of static methods for listing and finding Thread, ThreadGroup, and ThreadInfo objects.

    Please see the accompanying article: Java tip: How to list and find threads and thread groups

    Author:
    David R. Nadeau

    • Method Detail

      • getRootThreadGroup

        public static java.lang.ThreadGroup getRootThreadGroup()
        Get the root thread group in the thread group tree. Since there is always a root thread group, this method never returns null.
        Returns:
        the root thread group

      • getAllThreadGroups

        public static java.lang.ThreadGroup[] getAllThreadGroups()
        Get a list of all thread groups. Since there is always at least one thread group (the root), this method never returns a null or empty array.
        Returns:
        an array of thread groups

      • getThreadGroup

        public static java.lang.ThreadGroup getThreadGroup(java.lang.String name)
        Get the thread group with the given name. A null is returned if no such group is found. If more than one group has the same name, the first one found is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the thread group name to search for
        Returns:
        the thread group, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the name is null

      • getAllThreads

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getAllThreads()
        Get a list of all threads. Since there is always at least one thread, this method never returns null or an empty array.
        Returns:
        an array of threads

      • getGroupThreads

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getGroupThreads(java.lang.ThreadGroup group)
        Get a list of all threads in a thread group. An empty array is returned if there are no threads in the group.
        Parameters:
        group - the thread group to list
        Returns:
        an array of threads
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the group is null

      • getGroupThreads

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getGroupThreads(java.lang.String name)
        Get a list of all threads in a named thread group. A null is returned if the group cannot be found. An empty array is returned if there are no threads in the group.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the thread group
        Returns:
        an array of threads, or null if the group is not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the name is null

      • getAllThreadsPrioritized

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getAllThreadsPrioritized()
        Get a list of all threads, sorted from highest to lowest priority. Since there is always at least one thread, this method never returns null or an empty array. Since threads may change their priority during this method's sort, the returned thread list may not be correct by the time it is returned.
        Returns:
        an array of threads

      • getAllDaemonThreads

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getAllDaemonThreads()
        Get a list of all daemon threads. An empty array is returned if there are no daemon threads.
        Returns:
        an array of daemon threads

      • getAllThreads

        public static java.lang.Thread[] getAllThreads(java.lang.Thread.State state)
        Get a list of all threads with a given thread state. Thread states are defined in the Thread.State enum for the Thread class. Principal thread states include RUNNABLE, WAITING, TIMED_WAITING, and BLOCKED. An empty array is returned if there are no threads in the chosen state.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to look for
        Returns:
        an array of threads in that state

      • getThread

        public static java.lang.Thread getThread(java.lang.String name)
        Get the thread with the given name. A null is returned if no such thread is found. If more than one thread has the same name, the first one found is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - the thread name to search for
        Returns:
        the thread, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the name is null

      • getThread

        public static java.lang.Thread getThread(long id)
        Get the thread with the given ID. A null is returned if no such thread is found.
        Parameters:
        id - the thread ID to search for
        Returns:
        the thread, or null if not found

      • getThread

        public static java.lang.Thread getThread(java.lang.management.ThreadInfo info)
        Get the thread for the given thread info. A null is returned if the thread cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        info - the thread info to search for
        Returns:
        the thread, or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if info is null
